body: Dragonflies and Damselflies       Dragonflies and Damselflies (order Odonata)    Common Name Scientific Name   Broad-winged Damsel Fly Family Calopterygidea    - Ebony jewelwing Calopteryx maculata    - American rubyspot  Hetaerina american           Calpterygidae - broad-winged damselfly
title: Wind Cave National Park: damselflies
